title: What is this font?
content:
Need to identify this font  
many thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830230559im_/http:/typophile.com/files/prietowan_3842.jpg)
author: fas80

comments.content:
hi i need to know the name of this font

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830230559im_/http:/typophile.com/files/6484199053_d85b45ff10_o_3936.jpg)

@fas80: looks hand-drawn to me but having a look to [Jeff Levine](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830230559/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Jeff_Levine)'s fonts might worth a shot.  
@schrift: that's [Serif Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830230559/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/fonts/serif+gothic) but next time, try not hi-jacking an existing request and start your own topic.
